Detailed Description

Class used to watch the modification of a file. The file is periodically watched and if the date of the file is modified, the user is alerted by a signal.

Behind the FileWatcher, a thread watch modifications of all files referenced by a FileWatcher. The watcher can be desactivate and reactivate without delete the object. When the object is reactivated, the file date, in memory, is updated.

Member Function Documentation

void FileWatcher::activate (  ) 

Activate the watcher. The watcher is created activated. Use desactivate to desactivate.

void FileWatcher::desactivate (  ) 

Desactivate the watcher. You must called the activate method to reactivate the watcher.

void FileWatcher::fileChanged (  )  [signal]

The signal is emited when the watched file is modified.
